rule: Each description must not exceed eighty words in length.
input: A majestic mountain range with snow-capped peaks under a bright midday sun, surrounded by lush green forests and a clear blue sky.
coverage: A panoramic mountain range with towering snow-capped peaks shimmering under a bright midday sun. Lush green forests envelop the lower slopes against a clear blue sky. The strong sunlight casts defined shadows, highlighting the rugged terrain. The scene captures the serene and awe-inspiring beauty of pristine nature, evoking feelings of tranquility and grandeur in the viewer.
